name: Insulated Stainless Steel Bottle with Topographic Print
description: A water bottle - or a flask - that celebrates and protects the planet. Boon loves this Insulated Stainless Steel Bottle with Topographic Print. Designed for making and drinking coffee, tea, cocktails, and more, every detail is considered—from the freezable steel core that keeps drink cold without diluting (while also doubling as a muddle for cocktail making) to the electropolish interior finish that protects against the transfer of taste, smell, and mold. And it's made by Hibear, a fellow Climate Neutral brand who cares about the planet—and zero waste lifestyles—as much as Boon does. This bottle was designed to represent the Seven Summits—the highest mountains on each continent—and features artwork by Lauren Ouye, who draws inspiration from the topographic maps she studied while hiking in the Sierra Nevada Mountains.
details: Total volume: 32 oz.; Height: 11; Width: 3.7; Weight: 29 oz.
Made from double wall stainless steel with durable powder coat
12 oz. stainless steel filter for making coffee, tea, etc.
Invertible lid for brewing pour over coffee
Freezable, removable thermal core for keeping drinks cold without diluting
Removable silicone sleeve that doubles as another drinking vessel (perfect for pets!)
Insulation keeps drinks cold for 18 hours, or hot for 8 hours
Wide mouth design makes hand washing easy

name: Cookware Set
description: Ditch the chemicals with Caraway’s ceramic-coated cookware. Our complete set has everything you'll need for healthy cooking in your kitchen, staying organized with both our pot and lid holders, and looking good while doing so.
details: Fry pan - perfect for eggs, flipping pancakes and sautéing veggies
Saucepan - risottos, mac and cheese, soups and sauces are all welcome here
Sauté pan - your go-to pan for dinner parties, stir-fries and dishes with stock
Dutch oven - your new best friend for pastas, roasts, stews and boils
Magnetic pan racks - modular racks that house each pot for easy sideways access
Canvas lid holder - the perfect resting spot for all three lids to keep them at arm's reach

Boon loves this Insulated Stainless Steel Bottle with Mountain Artwork that is designed for making and drinking coffee, tea, cocktails, and more. name: Large Gold Baking Sheet
description: This gold non-stick carbon steel baking pan will quickly become your favorite. The textured bottom increases airflow for even baking.

name: Reclaimed Denim Lunch Box Napkins
description: Zero waste is the name of the game with Boon partner Atelier Saucier. These Reclaimed Denim Lunch Box Napkins feature brightly colored embroidery for each day of the week and complementary rolled edges—perfect for anything from lunch boxes to weekend breakfasts. Atelier Saucier makes them in their Los Angeles studio, sourced from local denim factories' surplus fabric that would otherwise go to waste. This set is great for teaching kids (and adults!) the importance of repurposing and eliminating single-use items like paper napkins.
details: Wash in cold water, hang dry, iron on low heat while damp

name: Reusable Zip Pouches Set of 3, Frenchie
description: Pack snacks or other fresh goodies in these French-inspired reusable zip pouches. Designed by our friends at Hello!Lucky.

name: Blue and White Stripe Repurposed Fabric Napkins
description: Zero waste is the name of the game with Boon partner Atelier Saucier. These classic Blue and White Stripe Repurposed Fabric Napkins are made from premium fashion fabric that would have otherwise gone to waste. The rescued textiles are given new life at Atelier Saucier's Los Angeles studio. Each napkin features rolled edges in dusty orange, flame red, deep pine green, or royal blue.
details: Wash in cold water, hang dry, iron on low heat while damp

name: Reusable Silicone Freezer Bags, Set of 2, Teal
description: Perfect to go from freezer to microwave and then into the dishwasher, these bags are a household must-have.

name: Reusable Zip Pouches, Set of 5
description: Reusable multi use food safe storage. Set of 5.

name: Insulated Zip Lunch Tote, Coral
description: Keep your cool with this insulated lunch tote in a classic color.
details: Coral. Woven handles with 7' drop length

name: Travel Tumbler, Teal
description: Whether you are at home or on-the-go, this borosilicate glass mug holds hot or cold drinks without tainting the taste. It is microwave safe so you sip and reheat your favorite hot drink throughout the day.
details: Made of borosilicate glass with silicone sleeve and lid.

name: Food Huggy, Set of 4
description: Keep open fruits and vegetables fresh with these silicone food huggies. Can also be used to cover bowls and cans. Set of 4.
details: Dishwasher, microwave, oven, and freezer safe

name: Compost Bin
description: The countertop canister holds food scraps until they are transferred to an outdoor compost bin. The in-lid carbon filter absorbs odors.

name: Silicone Popsicle Mold
description: Made of high quality food grade non toxic silicone. Create healthy popsicle treats any time of year.
details: Slots for ten popsicles, includes 20 sticks

name: Cookie Cutters With Pouch, Set of 5
description: These adorable cookie cutters are the perfect way to bring merry to your baked treats. This set comes with a pouch for storage.

name: Reusable Towels, Set of 4, Fruit
description: Set of four eco-friendly ultra absorbent towels. A great alternative to paper towels and plastic sponges.
details: Four different prints: Bananas, Oranges, Watermelons, Cherries.
Made of wood cellulose and cotton

name: Rectangle Silicone Lids, Set of 2
description: Set of two stretchy rectangle silicone lids. Perfect to cover casseroles, baked goods and all kinds of leftovers.
details: Fits a variety of rectangle containers up to 15 inches long.
Dishwasher, microwave, oven, and freezer safe

name: Mesh Drawstring Produce Bags, Set of 3
description: These drawstring produce bags are the perfect solution for eliminating plastic at the grocery store. Reusable and washable, the breathable material allows them to be stored in the fridge.

name: Hand Woven Organic Wool Wall Hangings - Set of 2
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in Guatemala and their commitment to craft. These Hand Woven Organic Wool Wall Hangings combine Territory's contemporary designs and their appreciation for traditional techniques. Artisans in Momostenango, Guatemala, use locally sourced raw sheep's wool that is transformed into yarn on spinning wheels and woven on foot looms to create these pieces, a process that has been passed down for centuries. Approximately 20" square, this set of two wall hangings are cream with contemporary tan and black accents.
details: Approximate size of each piece: 20" x 20"
Includes two hand carved rods for simple hanging

name: Jonote Fiber Three Tiered Hanging Basket
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in Mexico and their commitment to craft. The Jonote Fiber Three Tiered Hanging Basket is made from a jonote tree in the Puebla region of Mexico. Artisans in the mountain town of Cuetzalan curve the wood into the half-circle formations and hand knot the jonote fibers. This design works well for storing and displaying household items, particularly fruits and vegetables.
details: Approximate size: overall length is 30"; largest basket is 8" deep x 11" wide

name: Hand Knotted Palm Wall Hanging
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in Mexico and their commitment to craft. Intricacy and simplicity unite in their Hand Knotted Palm Wall Hanging. Territory partners with weavers in Oaxaca, Mexico, who take four full days to hand knot each of these pieces from pure palm fiber, an eco-friendly, renewable natural resource. Large in scale and organic in nature, this Palm Wall Hanging makes a bold design statement.

name: Textured Organic Wool Square Pillow Cover in Cream
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in Mexico and their commitment to craft. Their Textured Organic Wool Square Pillow Cover in Cream brings their values to life. Organic wool for each pillow cover is sourced locally, then dyed a soft shade of cream and handwoven at a family-run workshop in Mexico's Sierra Norte Mountains. The pillow's texture and pattern are true to Territory's modern aesthetic.
details: Pillow cover only, please purchase insert separately

name: Organic Wool Square Pillow Cover in Cream with Black Loops
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in Mexico and their commitment to craft. Their Organic Wool Square Pillow Cover in Cream with Black Loops is woven by hand at a family operated workshop in Mexico's Sierra Norte Mountains from organic wool that is locally sourced and dyed. Shown here with a cream background, with broken stripes in black and raised loops.
details: Pillow cover only, please purchase insert separately

name: Organic Wool Square Pillow Cover in Grey with Cream Loops
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in Mexico and their commitment to craft. Their Organic Wool Square Pillow Cover in Grey with Cream Loops is woven by hand at a family operated workshop in Mexico's Sierra Norte Mountains from organic wool that is locally sourced and dyed. Offered here in a grey ground, with dotted stripes in black and a raised loop pattern.
details: Pillow cover only, please purchase insert separately

name: Square Cotton Pillow Cover in Cream with Grey Brocade Stripe
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in India and their commitment to craft. Their Square Cotton Pillow Cover in Cream with Grey Brocade Stripe is a great example of the power of goods that do good. The intricate brocade design is the product of India's rich weaving tradition that grew out of the social reform movements of the 20th century. Mahatma Gandhi ignited a national program emphasizing the value khadi, handspun or handwoven cloth, by encouraging everyone to learn the art of spinning and weaving as a way to bridge social and economic gaps between the classes and as a means of national independence. Territory works with partners in South India who are committed to ensuring safe and fair work environments, improving the standard of living, and increasing literacy rates in the region.
details: Pillow cover only, please purchase insert separately

name: Square Cotton Pillow Cover in Grey with Cream Brocade Stripe
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in India and their commitment to craft. Their Square Cotton Pillow Cover in Grey with Cream Brocade Stripe features an intricate brocade design. It's also a prime example of goods that foster change. Mahatma Gandhi led India's social reform movement of the 20th century, which focused in part on the value of spinning and weaving. Gandhi encouraged everyone to learn the craft in hopes that it would be a unifier of the classes and a step away from foreign dependence. Territory works with partners in South India who are committed to ensuring safe and fair work environments, improving the standard of living, and increasing literacy rates in the region.
details: Pillow cover only, please purchase insert separately

name: Lumbar Cotton Pillow Cover in Cream with Grey Brocade Stripe
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in India and their commitment to craft. Their Lumbar Cotton Pillow Cover in Cream with Grey Brocade Stripe is a great examples of how a product can foster change. In 20th century India, Mahatma Gandhi led the social reform movement, which in part impelled a revolution of the country's storied weaving traditions. Gandhi believed that by teaching everyone to spin and weave, he could bridge the gap between classes and reduce the country's reliance on foreign goods. Territory works with partners in South India who are committed to ensuring safe and fair work environments, improving the standard of living, and increasing literacy rates in the region. Featured here in a cream with intricate brocade in iron grey.
details: Pillow cover only, please purchase insert separately

name: Grey Block Baby Alpaca Throw
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in Peru and their commitment to craft. The Grey Block Baby Alpaca Throw in varying shades of grey is oversized and lightweight, making it appropriate for year-round use. Made from pure baby alpaca fleece, sourced from ethically sheared alpacas who spend their time grazing in large stretches of the Peruvian highlands—a practice that naturally regenerates the landscape—this cozy blanket is both soft and sustainable. Territory created this throw in partnership with Peruvian weavers who are engaged in a national movement of creating and maintaining a sustainable, inclusive artisan economy. Super versatile - use this as a blanket or wrap!

name: Cotton Lumbar Pillow Cover in Clay with Frayed Edges
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in India and their commitment to craft. The Cotton Lumbar Pillow Cover in Clay with Frayed Edges exemplifies the power of goods to do good, and evokes the rich history of India. In the 1900's, Mahatma Gandhi led the social reform movement and fostered a renewed appreciation and interest in the country's well-respected weaving traditions. He believed that teaching people to spin and weave would help overcome the wealth divide and increase the country's independence from foreign powers. Territory works with partners in South India who are committed to ensuring safe and fair work environments, improving the standard of living, and increasing literacy rates in the region.
details: Pillow cover only, please purchase insert separately

name: Troubadour 2.0 Wood Headphones in Zebra Wood
description: Listen well knowing your purchase will go to a good cause when you support Boon partner LSTN Sound Co. The Troubadour 2.0 Wood Headphones in FSC certified Zebra Wood were inspired by wood as a material for musical instruments, and a commitment to excellent tonal balance and profile. In addition to the benefit of their rich, warm sound, each pair of headphones purchased provides a donation to the Starkey Hearing Foundation, who has provided over 1.5 million people around the world with access to hearing health care. Each set features vegan leather ear pads and built-in microphone and sound controls.
details: Designed in Los Angeles and Ethically Made in China

name: Cotton Square Pillow Cover in Clay with Frayed Edges

The Cotton Square Pillow Cover in Clay with Frayed Edges exemplifies the power of goods to do good, and evokes the rich history of India. In the 1900's, Mahatma Gandhi led the social reform movement and fostered a renewed appreciation and interest in the country's well-respected weaving traditions. He believed that teaching people to spin and weave would help overcome the wealth divide and increase the country's independence from foreign powers. Territory works with partners in South India who are committed to ensuring safe and fair work environments, improving the standard of living, and increasing literacy rates in the region. A dense cotton chambray, this pillow is soft but sturdy. Cover only, does not include insert.

name: Satellite 2.0 Bluetooth Speaker in Zebra Wood
description: Listen to the sound of impact from this Boon partner committed to supply chain excellence plus giving back. LSTN Sound Co.'s Satellite 2.0 Bluetooth Speaker in FSC Certified Zebra Wood delivers high-quality sound from its compact and portable frame. LSTN Sound Co. donates proceeds from each purchase to the Starkey Hearing Foundation, which provides hearing aids to people around the world. This natural wood-paneled speaker features Bluetooth 5.0 technology, a 30' range, and battery life of over eight hours.
details: Built-in microphone for speaker phone capability
Micro USB/Aux cable include for two hour charging
Designed in Los Angeles and Ethically Made in China

name: The Little Market 'Love & Light' Sending Love Gift Set
description:
Boon loves to partner with other female-founded businesses on a mission to support others. The Little Market is dedicated to elevating women through economic opportunities.
The Sending Love Gift Set features the 'Love & Light' candle and acacia heart bowl, a simple way to let your loved ones know you care. Both come carefully packed in a white gift box with ribbon.
The coconut milk scented candle is a product of The Little Market's collaboration with Prosperity Candle Co., a social enterprise that provides refugee women with the training and opportunities needed to create a better future for themselves and their loved ones. Each artisan hand pours a clean burning mix of coconut-soy wax scented with essential oils and finished with a cotton wick.
The heart bowl is made in collaboration with SAFFY from sustainably harvested acacia wood. SAFFY is a social enterprise in the Philippines that provides safe jobs and essential services to over 600 artisans throughout the country, most of whom are women. SAFFY's artisans carve each bowl by hand using techniques that have been passed down throughout generations.
details: Candle's glass vessel is designed to be repurposed or recycled; measures approximately 4" tall and 3.25" in diameter
Candle contains 10 oz. of wax, with a burn time of up to 70 hours
Heart bowl measures approximately 3" long x 1" deep
Heart bowl is made of food-safe acacia wood; you may wipe down with a natural preservative, such as olive oil, to preserve and prevent cracking
Do not use heart bowl in the microwave, dishwasher, or oven; hand wash only - no harsh detergents
Candle is Handmade in the USA
Heart Bowl is Ethically Made in the Philippines

name: Cotton Lumbar Pillow Cover in Cream with Frayed Edges
description: Boon partnered with Territory because of their dedication to artisans in India and their commitment to craft. The cotton Square Pillow Cover in Cream with Frayed Edges exemplifies the power of goods to do good, and evokes the rich history of India. In the 1900's, Mahatma Gandhi led the social reform movement and fostered a renewed appreciation and interest in the country's well-respected weaving traditions. He believed that teaching people to spin and weave would help overcome the wealth divide and increase the country's independence from foreign powers. Territory works with partners in South India who are committed to ensuring safe and fair work environments, improving the standard of living, and increasing literacy rates in the region. A dense cotton chambray, this pillow is soft but sturdy. Cover only, does not include insert.

name: The Little Market 'Happy Everything' Gift Set
description:
Boon loves to partner with other female-founded businesses on a mission to support others. The Little Market is dedicated to elevating women through economic opportunities.
The 'Happy Everything' Gift Set is perfect for anyone with something to celebrate! The cheerful 'Happy Everything' tote is made by the artisans at CORR - The Jute Works, an organization dedicated to empowering women in Bangladesh through market access, job training, and leadership development. These sustainable totes are made from jute, which absorbs carbon dioxide and releases oxygen at a rate much higher than trees. Jute is known for its strength and resilience, and this tote also features an eco-friendly laminated interior designed to further lengthen the product life cycle.
The champagne-scented 'Cheers' candle is a product of The Little Market's collaboration with Prosperity Candle Co., a social enterprise that provides refugee women with the training and opportunities needed to create a better future for themselves and their loved ones. Each artisan hand pours a clean burning mix of white coconut-soy wax scented with essential oils and finishes with a cotton wick.
details: Totes measures approximately 10" wide x 12" tall x 6" deep
Tote is made from pure jute fabric with a LDPE laminated water-resistant interior, AZO-free ink
Spot clean tote exterior, interior can be wiped clean with a damp cloth
Candle's glass vessel is designed to be repurposed or recycled; measures approximately 4" tall and 3.25" in diameter
Candle contains 10 oz. of wax, with a burn time of up to 70 hours
Candle is Handmade in the USA
Tote is Ethically Made in Bangladesh

description: These drawstring produce bags are the perfect solution for eliminating plastic at the grocery store. Reusable and washable, the breathable material allows them to be stored in the fridge.

name: Glass & Bamboo Water Bottle, Blush
description: Make your drink more enjoyable with this reusable tumbler.
details: Glass (dishwasher safe), lid and straw (handwash recommended)

name: Glass and Bamboo Storage
description: For lunches on the go or storage at home, this glass container with bamboo lid will become your favorite. The silicone ring around the lid keeps things airtight and oh-so-fresh. They stack nicely so you will want to buy a few.
details: Made of borosilicate glass with a bamboo lid.
Glass container is Dishwaser safe. Handwash bamboo lid.

name: Think Green Jute Tote in Kelly Green and Tan
description: Boon believes in living—and wearing—your values, and The Jacksons make that simple with their jute totes. The There is No Planet B Jute Tote in Kelly Green and Tan is an excellent reminder to live a zero waste lifestyle while focusing on social good. Made from jute, a sustainable fiber that requires little water and no chemical intervention to grow rapidly while regenerating the soil below, the bag holds up well to wear. Each jute bag is handmade by skilled artisans in Bangladesh, who receive fair wages and access to free schooling for their children and medical care for their families. We love the bright green hue, which is the result of a non-toxic process of dyeing in pots over a wood fire and sun drying. Think green, share green.
details: Measures approximately 17.3" x 16.5" with a 4" gusset and 5.9" handle drop

name: Sustainable Fique Market Bag in Copper
description: Show off your values and style when you carry this artisan-crafted Sustainable Fique Market Bag in Copper. Magda Made is a natural Boon partner for their commitment to zero waste plus social good. Fique—an eco-friendly fiber made from succulents that are harvested and grown locally in the Santander region of Colombia, then handwoven into bags by Soledad Tello, one of Magda Made's Fair Trade, artisan partners. The bag has natural coloration at top with a tightly woven bottom in a rich copper hue.
details: Approximate size: 20" height x 18" width with 11" strap drop
Sizing, stitching, and color may vary slightly due to handmade nature
Ethically made in Made in Curití, Colombia

name: There is No Planet B Jute Tote in Indigo and Tan
description: Boon believes in living—and wearing—your values, and The Jacksons make that simple with their jute totes. There is No Planet B Jute Tote in Indigo and Tan serves as a visual reminder that time is of the essence and we should all do our part to contribute to the health of our world. This bag doesn't just talk the talk, it's made from jute, an incredibly sustainable fiber that absorbs carbon dioxide and releases oxygen at a rate much higher than trees. Jute grows efficiently, reducing land use, with little water and no chemicals. Resilient to wear and tear, jute lengthens the product life cycle and reduces waste. The Jacksons partners with women in Bangladesh to hand-make each bag, and every artisan receives access to fair, direct pay, education, and healthcare in exchange. The deep shade of indigo is dyed naturally using non-toxic, AZO-free dyes.
details: Measures approximately 17.3" x 16.5" with a 4" gusset and 5.9" handle drop

name: Eco-friendly Round Rattan Backpack
description: Shop sustainably and support local artisans. Village Thrive embodies the Boon mindset by offering sustainable, natural products handmade by Balinese craftspeople. The Eco-friendly Round Rattan Backpack looks natural and supports the health of our planet. Rattan is incredibly sustainable, it's the fastest-growing tropical wood and preserves the rainforest's natural balance while converting carbon dioxide to oxygen. The techniques used to turn raw rattan wood into furniture and accessories have been passed down for generations, relying on handicraft rather than pollution-heavy manufacturing processes. Rattan's strength and resiliency will hold up well to normal wear and tear, reducing waste by lengthening the life of your bag. Each bag features an iron button closure and is lined in batik print fabric.
details: Comprised of rattan, leather, atta plant, and iron buttons

name: Think Green Jute Tote in Kelly Green and Tan
description: Boon believes in living—and wearing—your values, and The Jacksons make that simple with their jute totes. The There is No Planet B Jute Tote in Kelly Green and Tan is an excellent reminder to live a zero waste lifestyle while focusing on social good. Made from jute, a sustainable fiber that requires little water and no chemical intervention to grow rapidly while regenerating the soil below, the bag holds up well to wear. Each jute bag is handmade by skilled artisans in Bangladesh, who receive fair wages and access to free schooling for their children and medical care for their families. We love the bright green hue, which is the result of a non-toxic process of dyeing in pots over a wood fire and sun drying. Think green, share green.
details: Measures approximately 17.3" x 16.5" with a 4" gusset and 5.9" handle drop

name: Sustainable Cylindrical Woven Rattan Purse
description: Shop sustainably and support local artisans. Village Thrive embodies the Boon mindset by offering sustainable, natural products handmade by Balinese craftspeople. The Sustainable Cylindrical Woven Rattan Purse is handmade by Village Thrive's artisan partners in Bali. Woven with super strong rattan, a fast-growing material that benefits the rainforests it grows in, while also converting carbon dioxide into oxygen, this bag will stand the test of time. It features a unique cylindrical strap, iron button closure, and batik print lining.
details: Measures approximately 6.25" x 4.75", with a 22" strap
Comprised of rattan, leather, atta plant, and iron buttons

name: Sustainable Fique Market Bag in Black
description: Carry your values with this artisan-crafted Sustainable Fique Market Bag in Black. Magda Made is a natural Boon partner for their commitment to zero waste plus social good. Fique—an eco-friendly fiber made from succulents that are harvested and grown locally in the Santander region of Colombia, then handwoven into bags by Soledad Tello, one of Magda Made's Fair Trade, artisan partners. The upper portion of the bag is naturally colored and features a tightly woven black bottom.
details: Approximate size: 20" height x 18" width with 11" strap drop
Sizing, stitching, and color may vary slightly due to handmade nature
Ethically made in Made in Curití, Colombia

name: Handwoven Sun Visor in Black and Blonde
description: Shop sustainably and support local artisans. Village Thrive embodies the Boon mindset by offering sustainable, natural products handmade by Balinese craftspeople. The Handwoven Sun Visor in Black and Blonde is hand woven from Indonesian pandeanous leaves and combines boater and visor style to give you style and shade in one. Village Thrive partners with highly skilled craftspeople in Bali who use traditional techniques to harvest, dry, and weave these leaves into unique sun hats/visors. Contribute to local craftspeople and bring the tropics to your next outing. Offered in two sizes.
details: Total diameter measures approximately 14" with a 3.5" brim
S/M size is recommended for head circumferences between 20.5-21.5"
M/L size is recommended for head circumferences between 22-23"
Exact measurements may vary due to handmade nature
Carefully apply low heat from an iron to the brim to reshape if necessary

name: Handwoven Sun Hat in Golden Tan
description: Shop sustainably and support local artisans. Village Thrive embodies the Boon mindset by offering sustainable, natural products handmade by Balinese craftspeople. The Handwoven Sun Hat in Golden Tan is hand woven from Indonesian pandeanous leaves and combines boater and visor style to give you style and shade in one. Village Thrive partners with highly skilled craftspeople in Bali who use traditional techniques to harvest, dry, and weave these leaves into unique sun hats. Contribute to local craftspeople and bring the tropics home. Offered in two sizes.
details: Total diameter measures approximately 14" with a 3.5" brim
S/M size is recommended for head circumferences between 20.5-21.5"
M/L size is recommended for head circumferences between 22-23"
Exact measurements may vary due to handmade nature
Carefully apply low heat from an iron to the brim to reshape if necessary

name: Del Dia Dopp Kit, Navy
description: The Del Día dopp kit is sized just right, keeping your toothbrush and other grooming essentials protected and organized. Like all of the Del Día products, each Dopp is one of a kind, made with repurposed nylon and webbing by a sewer who has total control over its final look. The spacious main compartment is complemented by two internal side sleeves, and a large loop of webbing doubles as a carry handle and hang loop.

name: Do Good 5 Panel Hat, Papaya Lagoon
description: A classic five-panel hat sporting Cotopaxi's company creed, the Do Good 5 Panel Hat proclaims our mission to make an impact, and inspires others to do the same. Made from 100% cotton, this comfy lid features a subtle, graphic screen print and an adjustable, nylon strap with clip closure for easy adjustability.

name: Organic Cotton Blend Socks that Give Water
description: Treat your feet while giving back. Boon partnered with Conscious Step because of their commitment to giving and use of sustainable materials. The 'Organic Cotton Blend Socks that Give Water’ gift set features three pairs of crew-length socks that donate to Water.org, a nonprofit that provides families with access to safe water and sanitation solutions. The set includes three unique prints, each with water droplet embroidery: grey with storm blue and navy polka dots, storm blue with white stripes, and navy with storm blue and mint paisley. The organic, Fair Trade cotton is super soft and the terry padding gives your feet some extra support.
details: Size small is recommended for women's shoe sizes 5-9, and men's sizes 4-8
Size medium is recommended for women's shoe sizes 9.5-14 and men's sizes 8.5-13
75% Fairtrade Organic Cotton, 23% Recycled Polyester, 2% Elastane
Machine wash cold. Do not Bleach. Tumble dry Low. Do not Iron.

name: Repurposed Denim Dog Collar
description: Boon loves Foggy Dog nearly as much as we love our four-legged friends. The San Francisco-based company is committed to stylish, durable dog accessories with their American-made products, and they share Boon Market's passion for giving back—they donate a half pound of dog food to animal shelters with every purchase. This Repurposed Denim Dog Collar is part of The Foggy Dog's Upcycled Denim collection. For this collection, they partnered with The New Denim Project, a family-operated Guatemalan textile mill that rescues fabrics from nearby factories that would otherwise go to waste and turns them into something new using a chemical and dye-free process that requires very little water and power. This collection has conserved 320 million liters of water, prevented the release of 3,300 pounds of toxic chemicals, and avoided 32,000 pounds of carbon dioxide output. Both sides of the collar are comfortable, natural fabric, which is great for dogs prone to chafing or allergic reactions. Henry, a 23 pound French Bulldog, looks suave in size medium.
details: X-Small collars are 5/8" wide and fit necks between 8-12". Yorkies, Malteses, and Chihuahuas are a few examples of dogs who wear X-Small.
Small collars are 5/8" wide and fit necks between 11-16". Cocker Spaniels, Pugs, and Corgis are a few examples of dogs who wear Small.
Medium collars are 1" wide and fit necks between 14-19". Pit Bulls, Border Collies, and French Bulldogs are a few examples of dogs who wear Medium.
Large collars are 1" wide and fit necks between 18-26". Labs, Golden Retrievers, and German Shepherds are a few examples of dogs who wear Large.
Measuring your dog's neck to find the appropriate size is strongly recommended. Use a soft tape to measure circumference, allowing ample room to slip two fingers between the dog's neck and collar.
Hand wash or delicately machine wash in cold water. Air dry.

name: Repurposed Denim Squeaky Pet Toy
description: Boon loves Foggy Dog nearly as much as we love our four-legged friends. The San Francisco-based company is committed to stylish, durable dog accessories with their American-made products, and they share Boon Market's passion for giving back—they donate a half pound of dog food to animal shelters with every purchase. This Repurposed Denim Squeaky Pet Toy is part of The Foggy Dog's Upcycled Denim collection. For this collection, they partnered with The New Denim Project, a family-operated Guatemalan textile mill that rescues fabrics from nearby factories that would otherwise go to waste and turns them into something new using a chemical and dye-free process that requires very little water and power. This collection has conserved 320 million liters of water, prevented the release of 3,300 pounds of toxic chemicals, and avoided 32,000 pounds of carbon dioxide output. Each toy is stuffed with Sustainafill™, an eco-friendly fiber made from recycled plastic bottles. While a dog toy is almost never indestructible, Foggy Dog is given high praise on durability, and they use heavy-duty squeakers that keep going even when punctured.
details: Machine wash in cold water. Air dry.

name: Weatherproof Marine Rope Dog Leash in Crimson Red
description: Boon loves Foggy Dog nearly as much as we love our four-legged friends. The San Francisco-based company is committed to stylish, durable dog accessories with their American-made products, and they share Boon Market's passion for giving back—they donate a half pound of dog food to animal shelters with every purchase. The Weatherproof Marine Rope Dog Leash in Crimson Red is made of double-braided nylon, which is used year-round on boats for its weatherproof properties and resistance to mildew and fraying. The strong, marine rope is still comfortable for dog walkers even if Sophie tends to pull. Shown here in a vibrant crimson shade that is complemented by brass hardware industrially clamped to each end, as well as an O-ring for a waste bag dispenser or keys. Offered in both 4 and 6-foot lengths.
details: The petite leash measures approximately 5/16" in diameter and weights 5-6 oz.
The petite size is suggested for dogs weighing between 8-30 pounds. Not recommended for dogs over 35 pounds.
The standard size leash measures approximately 3/8" in diameter and weighs 8-9 oz.
The standard size leash features heavy-duty hardware that is suggested for dogs weighing between 35-200 pounds.
Guaranteed by The Foggy Dog's Lifetime Warranty.
Hand wash in warm water with mild soap. Air dry.

name: Love Print Swaddle and Scarf - Blue
description: Celebrate love with print swaddles and scarves designed with babies in mind. Boon partners with Lovevolve because of their commitment to social good. The 100% Organic Cotton Muslin Swaddle and Scarf in blue was designed in honor of the many changes that occur on the journey into parenthood. The unique artwork on each swaddle and scarf was created by Lovevolve founder, Sunny Stack Goode, who believes in the power of words to inspire change. Seeing positive words like ‘love’ can train the brain and lead to more compassion, resiliency, and authentic communication. This product is part of the HONOR THE SHIFT™ campaign which encourages new parents to build strong foundations ready for adaptation. Generously scaled: use as a swaddle, scarf, blanket, wrap or nursing cover.
details: Scarf measures 40" x 78" with fringed edges
The inks used for printing are AZO free, GOTS and Oeko-Tex certified, and completely free from harmful chemicals
Scarf is a blend of cotton, linen, and modal
Machine wash delicate in cold water and hang to dry. Light iron on low heat if needed.

name: Bright Coral Shibori Fabric Dyeing Kit
description: Get creative while giving back. Boon supports made in America, sustainable products—and We Gather helps you design your own. Learn the centuries-old art of Shibori dyeing with their Bright Coral Shibori Dyeing Kit. Each kit includes just enough low-impact dye to color three to six square yards of fabric, three shirts, or anything else you can dream up - while reducing runoff. Every detail is well thought out for maximum sustainability - the wooden shapes are cut from woodshop scraps, labels are produced hyper-locally (just one floor away from their Brooklyn studio!), and they use clamshell packaging made from recycled paper and cardboard. Enjoy the bright coral hue of your new textiles then continue learning with We Gather’s trusted sources. They encourage creators to learn about indigenous dyeing practices from around the world through World Shibori Network & Slow Fiber Studios. Each kit is assembled by hand in We Gather's Brooklyn studio.
details: Includes: dye powder, salt, soda ash, synthrapol textile detergent, wooden resist shapes, rubberbands, clothespins, biodegradable gloves, stirring sticks, and instructions
You will need: textiles to dye, a 3-5 gallon bucket, a smaller bucket or large bow, long-handled spoon, 2 empty cups for mixing, and water

name: Sashiko Linen Coaster Design Kit
description: Get creative while giving back. Boon supports made in America, sustainable products—and We Gather helps you design your own. The Sashiko Linen Coaster Design Kit is a great way to learn the Japanese art of Sashiko, a process of stitching and mending that has been practiced since the 17th or 18th centuries. Every detail is well thought out for maximum sustainability, from the needle holders cut from leather scraps, to the labels produced hyper-locally (just one floor away from their Brooklyn studio!) and the clamshell packaging made from recycled paper and cardboard. Your end result will be a pair of hand-dyed pure linen coasters with Sashiko-style stitching. Continue your sustainable stitching journey by exploring trusted sources like Upcycle Stitches and Sashiko Story.
details: Includes: two 5" x 5" squares of linen, pure cotton stitching thread, gold tipped needle, stitch template, wax-free transfer paper, and instructions

name: Mini Loom Artful Weaving Kit
description: Get creative while giving back. Boon supports made in America, sustainable products—and We Gather helps you design your own. The Mini Loom Artful Weaving Kit was created for the amateur weaver or craftsperson. The kit includes everything you need for your first foray into weaving: wooden loom, 6 colors of all-natural yarn, needle and instructions . Every detail is well thought out for maximum sustainability, from the labels produced hyper-locally (just one floor away from their Brooklyn studio!) to the clamshell packaging made from recycled paper and cardboard. The custom designed miniature loom is the perfect size for displaying your finished product and can be reused for future projects.
details: Includes: 3" x 3" wooden loom, six colors of all-natural yarn, weaving needle, and instructions
Yarn colors may vary from those pictured, but will always include six complementary options

name: Autumnal Plaid Flannel Bow Tie Dog Collar
description: Boon loves Foggy Dog nearly as much as we love our four-legged friends. The San Francisco-based company is committed to stylish, durable dog accessories with their American-made products, and they share Boon Market's passion for giving back—they donate a half pound of dog food to animal shelters with every purchase. Both sides of the Autumnal Plaid Flannel Bow Tie Dog Dog Collar are cozy cotton flannel, which is great for dogs prone to chafing or allergic reactions. The bow tie is secured by elastic loops and easily removable from your dog's more casual outings. Choose the small bow for a more traditional look, or the large for a bolder fashion statement. The fall-colored shades of mustard, burnt orange, cream, and slate are complemented by gold tone hardware. Hobie, a 29-pound beagle and very good boy, is wearing a Medium collar with Large bow tie.
details: X-Small collars are 5/8" wide and fit necks between 8-12". Yorkies, Malteses, and Chihuahuas are a few examples of dogs who wear X-Small.
Small collars are 5/8" wide and fit necks between 11-16". Cocker Spaniels, Pugs, and Corgis are a few examples of dogs who wear Small.
Medium collars are 1" wide and fit necks between 14-19". Pit Bulls, Border Collies, and French Bulldogs are a few examples of dogs who wear Medium.
Large collars are 1" wide and fit necks between 18-26". Labs, Golden Retrievers, and German Shepherds are a few examples of dogs who wear Large.
Small bow ties measure 4" x 2.5" and large bow ties measure 5" x 3.5".
Measuring your dog's neck to find the appropriate size is strongly recommended. Use a soft tape to measure circumference, allowing ample room to slip two fingers between the dog's neck and collar.
Hand wash or delicately machine wash in cold water. Air dry.

name: Teca Face Mask, Set of 3
description: Made using surplus fabric, these super comfortable, non-medical grade masks keep perfectly good materials out of the landfill. When you wear one, you put the health of your community first. Cotopaxi created a light, breathable mask—something we wouldn’t mind wearing all day long.
details: Wire nose adjustment and adjustable ear loops
Accordion pleats that adjust to your face shape
Care Instructions: machine wash cold, tumble dry low, warm iron if needed, do not bleach

name: Del Dia Travel Cube, 10L
description: Whether you’re road-tripping somewhere for the weekend or are living out of a backpack for two months, organization is key, and Cotopaxi's travel cubes keep all of your essentials in order. Made with repurposed materials and a wrap-around zipper for easy access, these simple organizers store clothes, toiletries, and other must-have items. Mesh side panels provide ample ventilation, while a top grab handle makes for easy carrying or pulling out of your pack.

name: Handwoven Sun Visor in Black and Blonde
description: Shop sustainably and support local artisans. Village Thrive embodies the Boon mindset by offering sustainable, natural products handmade by Balinese craftspeople. The Handwoven Sun Visor in Black and Blonde is hand woven from Indonesian pandeanous leaves and combines boater and visor style to give you style and shade in one. Village Thrive partners with highly skilled craftspeople in Bali who use traditional techniques to harvest, dry, and weave these leaves into unique sun hats/visors. Contribute to local craftspeople and bring the tropics to your next outing. Offered in two sizes.
details: Total diameter measures approximately 14' with a 3.5' brim
S/M size is recommended for head circumferences between 20.5-21.5'
M/L size is recommended for head circumferences between 22-23'
Exact measurements may vary due to handmade nature
Carefully apply low heat from an iron to the brim to reshape if necessary

name: Eco-friendly Round Rattan Backpack
description: Shop sustainably and support local artisans. Village Thrive embodies the Boon mindset by offering sustainable, natural products handmade by Balinese craftspeople. The Eco-friendly Round Rattan Backpack looks natural and supports the health of our planet. Rattan is incredibly sustainable, it's the fastest-growing tropical wood and preserves the rainforest's natural balance while converting carbon dioxide to oxygen. The techniques used to turn raw rattan wood into furniture and accessories have been passed down for generations, relying on handicraft rather than pollution-heavy manufacturing processes. Rattan's strength and resiliency will hold up well to normal wear and tear, reducing waste by lengthening the life of your bag. Each bag features an iron button closure and is lined in batik print fabric.
details: Comprised of rattan, leather, atta plant, and iron buttons

description: A classic five-panel hat sporting Cotopaxi's company creed, the Do Good 5 Panel Hat proclaims our mission to make an impact, and inspires others to do the same. name: Del Dia Travel Cube, 3L
description: Whether you’re road-tripping somewhere for the weekend or are living out of a backpack for two months, organization is key, and Cotopaxi's travel cubes keep all of your essentials in order. Made with repurposed materials and a wrap-around zipper for easy access, these simple organizers store clothes, toiletries, and other must-have items. Mesh side panels provide ample ventilation, while a top grab handle makes for easy carrying or pulling out of your pack.

name: Square Mountain Trucker Hat, Indigo
description: The perfect cap for when the sun is shining, and even for when it isn’t. Equipped with a mesh back panel, an adjustable snapback closure, and a woven patch graphic, the Square Mountain Trucker Hat is 100% cotton comfort.

name: Repurposed Denim Tie-Dye Napkins
description: Zero waste is the name of the game with Boon partner Atelier Saucier, the LA-based company makes everything in the USA and they're on a mission to reduce the fashion industry's fabric waste. Their Repurposed Denim Linen Tie-Dye Napkins come in a set of four soft and sustainable napkins that feature a crisp stitched edge that matches the dark denim.
details: Wash in cold water, hang dry, iron on low heat while damp

name: Repurposed Denim Napkins
description: Zero waste is the name of the game with Boon partner Atelier Saucier. Their Repurposed Denim Napkins rescue surplus fabric from premium denim factories in Los Angeles, and repurpose it into these simple but stylish napkins. American made and durable, the dark denim with tonal stitching complements a variety of tablescapes.
details: Wash in cold water, hang dry, iron on low heat while damp

description: Show off your values and style when you carry this artisan-crafted Sustainable Fique Market Bag in Copper. Magda Made is a natural Boon partner for their commitment to zero waste plus social good. Fique—an eco-friendly fiber made from succulents that are harvested and grown locally in the Santander region of Colombia, then handwoven into bags by Soledad Tello, one of Magda Made's Fair Trade, artisan partners. name: Compost Bin
description: The countertop canister holds food scraps until they are transferred to an outdoor compost bin. The in-lid carbon filter absorbs odors.

name: Girls Crushing It Entrepreneurship Kickstart Kit
description: At the heart of Boon is a passion for doing - and helping other do good too. The Girls Crushing It Entrepreneurship Kickstart Kits are the result of a powerful collaboration between two inspiring women - Roxanne Christophe, Founder & CEO of Girls Crushing It, and Boon Founder, Lily Kanter.
details: Contains 13 double-sided cards, 8 stickers, and a canvas pouch

name: Bright Coral Shibori Fabric Dyeing Kit
description: Get creative while giving back. Boon supports made in America, sustainable products—and We Gather helps you design your own. Learn the centuries-old art of Shibori dyeing with their Bright Coral Shibori Dyeing Kit. Each kit includes just enough low-impact dye to color three to six square yards of fabric, three shirts, or anything else you can dream up - while reducing runoff. name: Smoke Blue Kaleidoscope Fabric Dyeing Kit
description: Get creative while giving back. Boon supports made in America, sustainable products—and We Gather helps you design your own. Let the experiments begin with their Smoke Blue Kaleidoscope Fabric Dyeing Kit. Each kit includes a cotton scarf and low-impact fiber reactive dyes in shades of light coral, clean grey, and deep blue. Every detail is well thought out for maximum sustainability, from the labels produced hyper-locally (just one floor away from their Brooklyn studio!) to the clamshell packaging made from recycled paper and cardboard. Create a kaleidoscope of warmth and color at home or your next party.
details: Includes: 100% cotton scarf, three colors of dye powder, soda ash, pipettes, biodegradable gloves, stirring sticks, synthrapol textile detergent, zip-top bag, and instructions

name: Sashiko Linen Coaster Design Kit
description: Get creative while giving back. Boon supports made in America, sustainable products—and We Gather helps you design your own. The Sashiko Linen Coaster Design Kit is a great way to learn the Japanese art of Sashiko, a process of stitching and mending that has been practiced since the 17th or 18th centuries. Every detail is well thought out for maximum sustainability, from the needle holders cut from leather scraps, to the labels produced hyper-locally (just one floor away from their Brooklyn studio!) and the clamshell packaging made from recycled paper and cardboard. Your end result will be a pair of hand-dyed pure linen coasters with Sashiko-style stitching. Continue your sustainable stitching journey by exploring trusted sources like Upcycle Stitches and Sashiko Story.

name: Coral and Hot Pink Kaleidoscope Fabric Dyeing Kit
description: Get creative while giving back. Boon supports made in America, sustainable products—and We Gather helps you design your own. Let the experiments begin with the Coral and Hot Pink Kaleidoscope Fabric Dyeing Kit. Each kit includes a cotton scarf and low-impact fiber-reactive dyes in shades of russet, fuchsia and zinnia. Every detail is well thought out for maximum sustainability, from the labels produced hyper-locally (just one floor away from their Brooklyn studio!) to the clamshell packaging made from recycled paper and cardboard. name: Troubadour 2.0 Wood Headphones in Zebra Wood
description: Listen well knowing your purchase will go to a good cause when you support Boon partner LSTN Sound Co. The Troubadour 2.0 Wood Headphones in FSC certified Zebra Wood were inspired by wood as a material for musical instruments, and a commitment to excellent tonal balance and profile. In addition to the benefit of their rich, warm sound, each pair of headphones purchased provides a donation to the Starkey Hearing Foundation, who has provided over 1.5 million people around the world with access to hearing health care. Each set features vegan leather ear pads and built-in microphone and sound controls.
details: Designed in Los Angeles and Ethically Made in China
sub_catagory: The One Who Has it All

name: The Little Market 'Spa & Relaxation' Gift Set
description:
Boon loves to partner with other female-founded businesses on a mission to support others. The Little Market is dedicated to elevating women through economic opportunities.

The Little Market 'Spa & Relaxation' Gift Set is a great gift for a loved one in need of self-care. This set contains coconut-scented soap, sugar scrub, and soaking salt. The all natural sugar scrub is handmade by The Little Market's in-house production team, which is comprised of human trafficking survivors who are developing the skills they need for a bright future while also participating in the Survivor Leadership Program at Cast (the Coalition to Abolish Slavery and Trafficking).

The pink-hued soaking salts are made by women at Bright Endeavors, a non-profit social enterprise that helps young mothers in Chicago with what they need to excel in the workforce and build loving homes and strong families.

The soap is created in partnership with MADE by DWC, the social enterprise component of the Downtown Women's Center. The DWC provides empowerment, resources, and job training to women experiencing homelessness in Los Angeles.
details: Sugar scrub comes in a glass container that measures approximately 3" tall x 2.5" wide; 6 oz.
Soaking salt comes in a glass container that measures approximately 5.5" x 2"; 8 oz.
Soap measures approximately 4" x 2" x 1.5"; 6 oz.
Sugar Scrub Ingredients: white sugar, brown sugar, coconut oil, coconut fragrance oil
Soaking Salt Ingredients: Pink Himalayan sea salt and coconut fragrance oil (phthalate-free)

Soap ingredients: Coconut fragrance oil, palm oil, coconut oil, lauric acid, glycerin (kosher), honey, mango butter, purified water, sodium hydroxide, sodium lauryl sulfate, sorbitol, triethanolamine, sodium chloride, goat’s milk, vitamin E oil, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein, titanium dioxide
For best results, use within 6 months of opening
Scrub, salt, and soap are Handmade in the USA
sub_catagory: The One Who Has it All

name: Lavender Scented Best Teacher Ever Candle
description:
Boon loves to partner with other female-founded businesses on a mission to support others. The Little Market is dedicated to elevating women through economic opportunities.

The Lavender Scented Best Teacher Ever Candle is a perfect way to thank your favorite teachers. This candle is a product of The Little Market's collaboration with Prosperity Candle Co., a social enterprise that provides refugee women with the training and opportunities needed to create better futures for themselves and their loved ones. Each artisan hand pours a clean burning mix of white coconut-soy wax scented with essential oils and finishes with a cotton wick.
details: Measures approximately 4" tall and 3.25" in diameter
10 oz. of wax, with a burn time of up to 70 hours
Glass vessel designed to be recycled or repurposed
sub_catagory: The One Who Has it All

name: Eucalyptus Mint Candle
description: Turn your space into a sanctuary and relax with our spa scented soy candles. Beautifully packaged, makes a fabulous gift.
details: All natural, burns clean, environmentally friendly
sub_catagory: The One Who Has it All

name: Insulated Stainless Steel Bottle with Mountain Artwork
description: A water bottle - or a flask - that celebrates and protects the planet. Boon loves this Insulated Stainless Steel Bottle with Mountain Artwork that is designed for making and drinking coffee, tea, cocktails, and more. Every detail is considered—from the freezable steel core that keeps drinks cold without diluting (while also doubling as a muddle for cocktail making) to the electropolish interior finish that protects against the transfer of taste, smell, and mold. Bonus: It's made by Hibear, a fellow Climate Neutral brand who cares about the planet—and zero waste living—as much as Boon does. This limited-edition print was designed in collaboration with artist Bryan Merrell, whose whimsical work is inspired by the Sierra Nevada Mountains.
details: Total volume: 32 oz.; Height: 11"; Width: 3.7"; Weight: 29 oz.
Made from double wall stainless steel with durable powder coat
12 oz. stainless steel filter for making coffee, tea, etc
Invertible lid for brewing pour over coffee
Freezable, removable thermal core for keeping drinks cold without diluting
Removable silicone sleeve that doubles as another drinking vessel (perfect for pets!)
Insulation keeps drinks cold for 18 hours, or hot for 8 hours
Wide mouth design makes hand washing easy
sub_catagory: The One Who Has it All

name: Buffalo Check Pet Bandana
description: Boon loves Foggy Dog nearly as much as we love our four-legged friends. The San Francisco-based company is committed to stylish, durable dog accessories with their American-made products, and they share Boon Market's passion for giving back—they donate a half pound of dog food to animal shelters with every purchase. Each Buffalo Check Pet Bandana is sewn in a triangular shape that makes it easy to tie, simultaneously eliminating both fabric waste and the need to fold. This classic black and red buffalo check design looks adorable on Kaia, a 45-pound Husky wearing Large, and Mara, a 50-pound Pit Bull mix wearing Medium.
details: Small bandanas measure 7" top to point and fit necks up to 13". Yorkies, Malteses, and Chihuahuas are a few examples of dogs who wear Small bandanas.
Medium bandanas measure 9.5" top to point and fit necks up to 18". Cocker Spaniels, French Bulldogs, and Corgis are a few examples of dogs who wear Medium bandanas.
Large bandanas measure 11.5" top to point and fit necks up to 22". Labs, Golden Retrievers, and German Shepherds are a few examples of dogs who wear Large bandanas.
Measuring your dog's neck to find the appropriate size is strongly recommended. Use a soft tape to measure circumference, allowing ample room to slip two fingers between the dog's neck and bandana.
If your dog is between sizes, sizing up is recommended.
Hand wash or delicately machine wash in cold water. Air dry.
sub_catagory: The One Who Has it All
